name: Save Your Plant
description:
What a nice day to water your plant. It must grow healthy to become a strong tree, so better water it right away. Wait. Where is it?

Save Your Plant is a very VERY short top down shooter game where you must defeat bad guys in order to save your plant and water it before it's too late. The game was made in a single day as a challenge and to get used to GDevelop5.

This game is recommended to be played on Chrome. If inputs are not responding reload the page.
